pages.text: $(li)The Chorus Fruit on a Stick can be use to ride a $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/endergrade)Endergrade$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be crafted with a Fishing Rod and a Chorus Fruit in a Crafting Table.

$(li)To ride a Endergrade, first you have to equip a Saddle to the Endergrade.$(br)$(li)Then, right click to the Endergrade to ride it.$(br)$(li)Now just hold the Chorus Fruit on a Stick on your hand to make walk your Endergrade in any direction.
